description: The Vanguard Alta+ 203AP Aluminum Alloy Tripod is designed to meet the requirements of the most demanding photographer. This aluminum alloy tripod offers a magnesium canopy and head. The legs can all be adjusted individually to 3 different angles (25° 50° 80°) for uneven terrain and low angle shooting. The dual locking safety mechanism and anti-shock ring prevent the damage that can be caused by camera vibration and will eliminate any worries you might have about your equipment falling from the tripod during transportation. Ergonomic handles, easy to lock panhead, large foam grips for all weather use and spiked rubber feet for increased stability are all features offered by this series.
title: Vanguard Alta Plus 203AP 3-Section Aluminum Tripod with 3-way Magnesium Alloy Panhead
